channel.title: Article Spinners - Make Money Online From 0$ - tgmember.com
channel.description: Article Spinners - Make Money Online From 0$ - tgmember.com

item.title: Spun By Google Content Spinner 1.0
item.description: Name : Spun By Google Content Spinner Version : 1.0 OS : Windows Type : Article Spinner Price : $0 Homepage : SalePage Spun By Google Article Spinner is an article spinner software tool that uses Google translate to spin your content so you know the result is grammatically correct well formed content in the eyes of Google. This free content spinning tool simply throws your content in and out of Google translate. There are different options for how many times you want it spun and how hard you want it spun. The content it generates is perfect for lower tires in tired link building campaigns and even expired web 2.0s. NOTE: Please do not use spun content on your main/money website it is against Google webmaster terms and can result in your website being deindexed.
item.yandex:full-text: Features By throwing your content back and forth through Google translate it changes but is always kept gramatically correct due to Google's excellent translation service. You can spin the content up to 10 times and spin soft, medium or hard. You can also shuffle the sentances.
item.turbo:content:
Features


  • By throwing your content back and forth through Google translate it changes but is always kept gramatically correct due to Google's excellent translation service. You can spin the content up to 10 times and spin soft, medium or hard. You can also shuffle the sentances.

item.title: SpinnerChief 5 Ultimate 9.2.6
item.description: Name : SpinnerChief 5 Version : Ultimate Version v9.2.6 OS : Windows Type : Content Marketing Tools Price : $217 Homepage : SalePage The Real Best Article Spinner SpinnerChief III can not only generate hundreds of new articles in minutes for you, but also in one click it can rewrite articles to a very high level of human readability and uniqueness because it uses The Best Natural Language Analysis and Artificial Intelligence techniques to understand your articles in the same way as Google does.
item.yandex:full-text: Features All the basic functions of a normal article spinner. Thesaurus is saved locally, so the speed is very fast. Paragraph/Sentence edit mode, you can rewrite paragraphs/sentences easily. Import synonyms from text files - multiple formats supported. Batch-spin articles. Spin large numbers of articles automatically. Export articles with other syntax formats like [|] [/] %% and so on. Favorites function - Add/Manage your favorite synonyms thesaurus based on your own categories and niches. Quick Preview - Easily preview the spun article and quickly locate the position you want to modify. Developer API - Now, programmers can integrate SpinnerChief functions into their own programs. Protect important keywords words in spun articles. Auto-add anchor text links in spun articles. "Uniqueness" percentage indicator. Batch-compare articles similarity function. Super Spin : Rewrite articles to a very high level of human readability and uniqueness using The Best Natural Language Analysis and Artificial Intelligence techniques. Paragraph and setence spin fully automatically. Spin Tree : The spin tree function makes manual paragraph and sentence spinning extremely easy. Cloud Thesaurus : Access over a million synonyms created by real users and use the cloud thesaurus phrase replacement feature to generate human-readable and unique new articles automatically. The number of synonyms in the thesaurus is increasing daily. Click here for more details. Part Of Speech : POS matching identifies the context of words. The POS engine can calculate whether a synonym is a noun, a verb, an adjective etc. SpinnerChief matches the part of speech of a synonym to its original word, so you can achieve grammatically and contextually correct articles! Custom/Cloud Grammar A.I. : This is not a normal grammar checker, it is a revolutionary way to correct your grammar when spinning articles to generate articles that are more readable. You can use your own custom grammar A.I. or use the Cloud A.I. generated by all users. Custom/Cloud Rules : Cloud Rules is supplementary to the POS function. This function can select better synonyms by analysing the related words in the sentence. This will help you to generate more readable articles, the rules are created by users and its effectiveness is increasing daily. Custom/Cloud Negs : Cloud Negs is another revolutionary feature invented by us for removing bad synonyms. The cloud negs database is based on all users' selections and input too. Using this function, the program will use better quality synonyms when spinning your article. Submit article(s) to your blogs and many article directories directly from SpinnerChief (Supports post scheduling). Tips Plugin : You have seen this type of article before - e.g. "10 Tips To Lose Weight" The key factor about this type of article is that each tip (each paragraph) makes sense in its own right - independently of the rest of the article. So if you can get a bunch of these paragraphs together, then you can mix any number of paragraphs in order to make your new article. The SpinnerChief TIPS plugin will do this task effortlessly for you. Check the details by clicking here SK Plugin : It's a long, long job to research your keywords, keyword phrases, LSi's etc and then to write content for your chosen search term that has the perfect keywords, and the perfect density of those keywords. This plugin looks at the top 10 Google SERPS for your search term, compares them to each other, and then tells you the keywords that ALL the top 10 pages are using in their content, PLUS the density of those keywords. In less than a minute you will know EXACTLY which keywords and their relevant density to include in your website copy so that it matches Google's exact keyword expectations. Click here for more details. Miracle Thesaurus : They said it couldn't be done! Our Miracle Thesaurus CAN auto-spin to a human-readable level! Click here for more details. Video Scraper :This function scrapes videos from Youtube according to your keywords and you can easily insert these videos into your article with one click. Click here for more details. Picture Scraper : This function scrapes pictures from the inte.com according to your keywords and you can easily insert these pictures into your article with one click. Click here for more details. Scraper + Spinner + Submitter All In One Project create/save/load : Save all of the SpinnerChief feature settings as a project - load the project thesaurus automatically. No more having to go through all the settings and set them to your preferences before you start to work - load up your project and you're away! Article scraper : Choose any one of our carefully selected sources and scrape articles based on your keywords, then import them straight in to SpinnerChief ready to start spinning! Copyscape plugin : Enter your Copyscape ID and api and check any article straight from SpinnerChief. SC duplicate copy checker : Similar function to Copyscape to check if there are duplicate copies of your article published on the inte.com. The good thing is that you don't need to pay any credits to check your article by using this function - it's totally free! Content Hurricane plugin : This awesome tool (see contenthurricane.com) is now integrated as a plugin for SpinnerChief! Html Spin : Import full web pages, protect the html code when you spin, easily edit the html code, add and spin images - great for creating simple spun web pages and blog posts. SEO Writing : Keyword Density Count - check the density of your project keywords, and add any more keywords that you want to check. Batch add hyperlink : Highlight a bunch of selected words in your article, and make them all anchortext for any url - great for generating powerful backlinks. Import variables from csv files : in SpinnerChief you can now import sequentially instead of randomly. Swap paragraph : Easily swap paragraphs when you spin to make your articles more unique. Free update : We update our software often and you can always get the newest version by using the auto-update. Much much more are not listed here......
item.turbo:content:
Features


  • All the basic functions of a normal article spinner.
  • Thesaurus is saved locally, so the speed is very fast.
  • Paragraph/Sentence edit mode, you can rewrite paragraphs/sentences easily.
  • Import synonyms from text files - multiple formats supported.
  • Batch-spin articles. Spin large numbers of articles automatically.
  • Export articles with other syntax formats like [|] [/] %% and so on.
  • Favorites function - Add/Manage your favorite synonyms thesaurus based on your own categories and niches.
  • Quick Preview - Easily preview the spun article and quickly locate the position you want to modify.
  • Developer API - Now, programmers can integrate SpinnerChief functions into their own programs.
  • Protect important keywords words in spun articles.
  • Auto-add anchor text links in spun articles.
  • "Uniqueness" percentage indicator.
  • Batch-compare articles similarity function.
  • Super Spin : Rewrite articles to a very high level of human readability and uniqueness using The Best Natural Language Analysis and Artificial Intelligence techniques.
  • Paragraph and setence spin fully automatically.
  • Spin Tree : The spin tree function makes manual paragraph and sentence spinning extremely easy.
  • Cloud Thesaurus : Access over a million synonyms created by real users and use the cloud thesaurus phrase replacement feature to generate human-readable and unique new articles automatically. The number of synonyms in the thesaurus is increasing daily. Click here for more details.
  • Part Of Speech : POS matching identifies the context of words. The POS engine can calculate whether a synonym is a noun, a verb, an adjective etc. SpinnerChief matches the part of speech of a synonym to its original word, so you can achieve grammatically and contextually correct articles!
  • Custom/Cloud Grammar A.I. : This is not a normal grammar checker, it is a revolutionary way to correct your grammar when spinning articles to generate articles that are more readable. You can use your own custom grammar A.I. or use the Cloud A.I. generated by all users.
  • Custom/Cloud Rules : Cloud Rules is supplementary to the POS function. This function can select better synonyms by analysing the related words in the sentence. This will help you to generate more readable articles, the rules are created by users and its effectiveness is increasing daily.
  • Custom/Cloud Negs : Cloud Negs is another revolutionary feature invented by us for removing bad synonyms. The cloud negs database is based on all users' selections and input too. Using this function, the program will use better quality synonyms when spinning your article.
  • Submit article(s) to your blogs and many article directories directly from SpinnerChief (Supports post scheduling).
  • Tips Plugin : You have seen this type of article before - e.g. "10 Tips To Lose Weight" The key factor about this type of article is that each tip (each paragraph) makes sense in its own right - independently of the rest of the article. So if you can get a bunch of these paragraphs together, then you can mix any number of paragraphs in order to make your new article. The SpinnerChief TIPS plugin will do this task effortlessly for you. Check the details by clicking here
  • SK Plugin : It's a long, long job to research your keywords, keyword phrases, LSi's etc and then to write content for your chosen search term that has the perfect keywords, and the perfect density of those keywords. This plugin looks at the top 10 Google SERPS for your search term, compares them to each other, and then tells you the keywords that ALL the top 10 pages are using in their content, PLUS the density of those keywords. In less than a minute you will know EXACTLY which keywords and their relevant density to include in your website copy so that it matches Google's exact keyword expectations. Click here for more details.
  • Miracle Thesaurus : They said it couldn't be done! Our Miracle Thesaurus CAN auto-spin to a human-readable level! Click here for more details.
  • Video Scraper :This function scrapes videos from Youtube according to your keywords and you can easily insert these videos into your article with one click. Click here for more details.
  • Picture Scraper : This function scrapes pictures from the inte.com according to your keywords and you can easily insert these pictures into your article with one click. Click here for more details.
  • Scraper + Spinner + Submitter All In One
  • Project create/save/load : Save all of the SpinnerChief feature settings as a project - load the project thesaurus automatically. No more having to go through all the settings and set them to your preferences before you start to work - load up your project and you're away!
  • Article scraper : Choose any one of our carefully selected sources and scrape articles based on your keywords, then import them straight in to SpinnerChief ready to start spinning!
  • Copyscape plugin : Enter your Copyscape ID and api and check any article straight from SpinnerChief.
  • SC duplicate copy checker : Similar function to Copyscape to check if there are duplicate copies of your article published on the inte.com. The good thing is that you don't need to pay any credits to check your article by using this function - it's totally free!
  • Content Hurricane plugin : This awesome tool (see contenthurricane.com) is now integrated as a plugin for SpinnerChief!
  • Html Spin : Import full web pages, protect the html code when you spin, easily edit the html code, add and spin images - great for creating simple spun web pages and blog posts.
  • SEO Writing : Keyword Density Count - check the density of your project keywords, and add any more keywords that you want to check.
  • Batch add hyperlink : Highlight a bunch of selected words in your article, and make them all anchortext for any url - great for generating powerful backlinks.
  • Import variables from csv files : in SpinnerChief you can now import sequentially instead of randomly.
  • Swap paragraph : Easily swap paragraphs when you spin to make your articles more unique.
  • Free update : We update our software often and you can always get the newest version by using the auto-update.
  • Much much more are not listed here......

item.title: Spintax Buddy 2.4
item.description: Name : Spintax Buddy Version : 2.4 OS : Windows Type : Spinner Price : $27 Homepage : SalePage Sooner Or Later All Marketers Use Spintax For most people, using spintax is a major pain in the behind. We use it because it provides a level of flexibility and power unmatched by any other content manipulation model, but that doesn't mean we have to like it... NEW SOFTWARE SHATTERS THE SPINTAX BARRIER WITH PURE DRIVEN SIMPLICITY
item.yandex:full-text: Features Spintax used to confuse the heck out of me. I understood the concept just fine, but as I built/wrote it, it became more and more confusing to the point that my sentences didn't end up making since. So I created a new software program that takes all of that hard and confusing stuff and restructures it into a very simple step by step process. Basically, how I do it is one word or phrase at a time So, I create my little word group one word, one line at a time. Then I allow the software to spin it and save that spin file for me. I named mine: me myself and I Then I move on to the next chunk of text I want to spin. Take the same little step, save it with a name that means something to me and so on. I do that with every part - That way I am breaking it all down into very small easy steps. Now, when I get ready to create my full spintax string (phrase/sentence/paragraph) I just click the "Open Spintax" button and one by one select the spintax that I want to paste into whatever project I am working on. I also have the option of creating variants on the fly. In other words, I can select a bunch of the little spintax scripts I created and saved, and the software will properly merge them together and produce however many variations I want in plain text. So, in places that I can't use spintax, I can still spintax my text and create virtually unlimited unique variations so that I never get hit with any duplicate content nonsense. Having the ability to create great spintax scenarios is what separates hobbyists from professionals. It doesn't matter if you are spinning complete articles, single paragraphs, or simple sentences, when you use spintax you open a whole new world. I have a friend who is a professional kindle short story writer, and any time he runs into a situation where his sentence or paragraph just doesn't "feel" right, he opens up SpintaxBuddy and near instantly solves the problem. Here is an example: (created using SpintaxBuddy) I love being able to use SpintaxBuddy to generate unique content on demand! We enjoy having the ability to create unique content using spintax. Here is another example: (created using SpintaxBuddy) When Jacod heard the deep gravely rumble as Thomas yelled Ruuuuun... As Jacob listened to the baritone rumble of Thomas screaming Ruuuuun... Get It? With spintax you can change the game. Always have unique content while saying essentially the same thing. Example Variants Created From Spintax That Took Less Than 2 Minutes To Create Using This Software... I love the software to immediately create articles as needed. I have the knowledge to easily alter posts whenever I want! I have the knowledge to easily alter comments as often as possible. I want the ability to automatically rewrite text on demand. I enjoy the ability to automatically rewrite text on demand. I love the software to immediately create text on demand. I enjoy the ability to automatically rewrite articles as needed. I love the knowledge to easily alter posts whenever I want! I need the software to immediately create articles as needed. I love the software to immediately create articles 45 times per day I need the knowledge to easily alter posts whenever I want! I have the knowledge to automatically rewrite text on demand. I want the software to immediately create articles as needed. I love the software to easily alter posts whenever I want! I enjoy the ability to easily alter posts whenever I want! I love the software to immediately create sentences 45 times per day I love the software to immediately create articles as often as possible. I love the software to immediately create comments as often as possible. I love the ability to automatically rewrite text on demand. I enjoy the ability to automatically alter posts whenever I want! I have the knowledge to easily alter text on demand. I love the software to immediately rewrite text on demand. I enjoy the ability to automatically rewrite text whenever I want! I have the knowledge to easily spin sentences 45 times per day I need the ability to automatically rewrite text on demand.
item.turbo:content:
Features




Spintax used to confuse the heck out of me. I understood the concept just fine, but as I built/wrote it, it became more and more confusing to the point that my sentences didn't end up making since.
So I created a new software program that takes all of that hard and confusing stuff and restructures it into a very simple step by step process.

Basically, how I do it is one word or phrase at a time So, I create my little word group one word, one line at a time. Then I allow the software to spin it and save that spin file for me.
I named mine: me myself and I Then I move on to the next chunk of text I want to spin. Take the same little step, save it with a name that means something to me and so on.
I do that with every part - That way I am breaking it all down into very small easy steps.
Now, when I get ready to create my full spintax string (phrase/sentence/paragraph) I just click the "Open Spintax" button and one by one select the spintax that I want to paste into whatever project I am working on.
I also have the option of creating variants on the fly. In other words, I can select a bunch of the little spintax scripts I created and saved, and the software will properly merge them together and produce however many variations I want in plain text. So, in places that I can't use spintax,
I can still spintax my text and create virtually unlimited unique variations so that I never get hit with any duplicate content nonsense.

Having the ability to create great spintax scenarios is what separates hobbyists from professionals.
It doesn't matter if you are spinning complete articles, single paragraphs, or simple sentences, when you use spintax you open a whole new world.
I have a friend who is a professional kindle short story writer, and any time he runs into a situation where his sentence or paragraph just doesn't "feel" right, he opens up SpintaxBuddy and near instantly solves the problem. Here is an example: (created using SpintaxBuddy) I love being able to use SpintaxBuddy to generate unique content on demand! We enjoy having the ability to create unique content using spintax. Here is another example: (created using SpintaxBuddy) When Jacod heard the deep gravely rumble as Thomas yelled Ruuuuun... As Jacob listened to the baritone rumble of Thomas screaming Ruuuuun... Get It? With spintax you can change the game. Always have unique content while saying essentially the same thing.

  • Batch add hyperlink : Highlight a bunch of selected words in your article, and make them all anchortext for any url - great for generating powerful backlinks.
  • Import variables from csv files : in SpinnerChief you can now import sequentially instead of randomly.
  • Swap paragraph : Easily swap paragraphs when you spin to make your articles more unique.
  • Free update : We update our software often and you can always get the newest version by using the auto-update.
  • Much much more are not listed here......

item.description: Name : X-Spinner Version : Elite Dev 3.5 OS : Windows Type : Content Marketing Tools Price : $297 Homepage : SalePage The Best Spinner to Use With Third-Party Software X-Spinner supports all third-party software and allows you to spin unlimited articles with blinding speed, better results and a lower price. item.yandex:full-text: Features Supports all third-party software. Use our free spin feature to deal with API spinning queries. Use Pro spin's advanced features (Enable Pos, NLP, AI and grammar checker,etc) to deal with api spinning queries and get better spinning results. Use Elite/Super Spin (Enable Statistical Replacement Technology, Artificial Intelligence and Emulated Natural Language methods) to deal with api spinning queries and get the best spinning results. Deal with one API query very fast. Deal with multi-API queries very fast simultaneously.(This is normally enough for personal use) Import your own thesaurus to work with API queries. Remove original word function. Protect words function. Spin to new article. Spin to {|} format. Html Spin : Spin full web pages, protect the html code when you spin. Super Spin : Rewrite articles to a very high level of human readability and uniqueness using The Best Natural Language Analysis and Artificial Intelligence techniques. Paragraph and setence spin fully automatically. Cloud Thesaurus : Access over a million synonyms created by real users and use the cloud thesaurus phrase replacement feature to generate human-readable and unique new articles automatically. The number of synonyms in the thesaurus is increasing daily. Click here for more details. Part Of Speech : POS matching identifies the context of words. The POS engine can calculate whether a synonym is a noun, a verb, an adjective etc. SpinnerChief matches the part of speech of a synonym to its original word, so you can achieve grammatically and contextually correct articles! Custom/Cloud Grammar A.I. : This is not a normal grammar checker, it is a revolutionary way to correct your grammar when spinning articles to generate articles that are more readable. You can use your own custom grammar A.I. or use the Cloud A.I. generated by all users. Custom/Cloud Rules : Cloud Rules is supplementary to the POS function. This function can select better synonyms by analysing the related words in the sentence. This will help you to generate more readable articles, the rules are created by users and its effectiveness is increasing daily. Custom/Cloud Negs : Cloud Negs is another revolutionary feature invented by us for removing bad synonyms. The cloud negs database is based on all users' selections and input too. Using this function, the program will use better quality synonyms when spinning your article. Free update : We update our software often and you can always get the newest version by using the auto-update. Deal with huge API queries very fast simultaneously. Load all language/thesaurus and spin articles in all languages at the same time. Run X-Spinner on a server to provide spinning service. Auto-Resume from crash. Customize the listen IP address. Cusomize max online amount and max spin object.

item.title: AI Article Rewriter 1.6
item.description: Name : AI Article Rewriter Version : 1.6 OS : Windows Type : Article Rewriter Tools Price : $67 Homepage : SalePage Google loves content and they say "Content Is King", but good content doesn't come cheap!! You can easily spend hundreds of dollars getting content written for your blog/site. And, then of course there's the problem of finding reliable writers who can deliver quality content that passes Copyscape 100%. How about a software that does the research for you and also writes impeccable content at the push of a button? AI Article Rewriter isn't an average article spinner. It's going to take premium quality content from the web and turn it 100% Copyscape Proof unique content by spinning Unicodes (language that broiwsers use to read content).The result is 100% unique content to the browsers and search engines without any visible changes to the human eye. The content will read like it's been hand written by a premium writer!! You can now have hundreds of pages of premium content in a matter of minutes!! Thousands of dollars and dog hours saved!
